metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o  Serve with breadsticks.  Arancini   Ingredients :
o  Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad. o  Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad. o  Toss gently and serve.

milk, beaten egg, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper.   Shape the mixture into a loaf and place in a baking dish.   Bake for 1 hour until cooked through.   Let rest before slicing and serving.
  Spread mashed potatoes over the top and sprinkle with grated cheddar cheese.   Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and bubbly.   Serve warm.

green onions, minced garlic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl. o  Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and roll tightly. o  Fry in hot oil until golden. o  Drain on paper towels and serve with dipping sauce.
